analyzed: theḥ apadāna  nāga sa māla vagga
translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Nāgasamāla
thrown out on the great road,🔽I placed on the shrine
of the one with a topknot, the one who binds the world.
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping a shrine.
and the eight liberations as well,
the six supernormal knowledges were realized,
the Buddha’s instruction was fulfilled.”🔽Thus did the Elder Nāgasamāla recite these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā nāgasamālo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Nāgasamālattherassāpadānaṁ paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā nāgasamālaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽nāgasamāla therassa apadānam
translated: The Elder Nāgasamāla’s Birth Story is the first.
